report.rawcontent:
##all plots: Ploughed: Oct 13, 1965. Spring-tine cultivated: March 29, 1966, Ploughed: June 21, Spring-tine cultivated: July 8, Aug 12,
##Ley: Half basal PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O: Oct 26, 1965, Remaining basal PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O: Mar 22, 1966. 'Nitro-Chalk' applied at 0.4 cwtN/acre, seed sown 1 lb English Italian ryegrass, 2 lb Danish Italian ryegrass, 1.5 lb English Broad Red clover, 0.5 lb Canadian Alsike Clover, Mixture sown at 29 lb: Mar 30. Cut twice for hay: July 4, Aug 26,
##Potatoes: Half basal PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O: Oct 26, 1965. Remaining basal PK 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O, and 'Nitro-Chalk' applied at 1.2 cwtN/acre: Mar 23, 1966, Rotary cultivated, potatoes machine planted Pentland Dell: Mar 29, Earthed up: June 8, Sprayed with mancozeb 1.2 lb in 33 gals: June 29, July 15, Aug 4, Haulm mechanically destroyed: Sept 3, Lifted: Sept 13.
##Wheat: Half basal PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O: Oct 26, 1965. Remaining basal PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O: Oct 29. Seed drilled, Capelle 150 lb: Nov 2. N1 Nitro-Chalk applied as top-dressing at 0.5 cwtN/acre: Apr 12, 1965 N2 Nitro-Chalk applied as top-dressing at 1.0 cwtN/acre: Apr 12, 1965 N3 Nitro-Chalk applied as top-dressing at 1.5 cwtN/acre: Apr 12, 1965 N4 Nitro-Chalk applied as top-dressing at 2.0 cwtN/acre: Apr 12, 1965, Combine harvested: Aug 25.
##Barley: Half basal PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O: Oct 26, 1965. Remaining basal PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O: Mar 7, 1966, Seed drilled - Maris Badger 140 lb, Mar 8 N1 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 0.4 cwtN/acre: Apr 8 N2 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 0.8 cwtN/acre: Apr 8 N3 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 1.2 cwtN/acre: Apr 8 N4 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 1.6 cwtN/acre: Mar 8, Combine harvested: Aug 18.

##Ley: Half PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O, ploughed: Sept 14, 1966. Remaining PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O, seed sown at 29 lb: Sept 16, 'Nitro-Chalk' applied at 0.4 cwtN/acre: Mar 17, 1967. Cut three times for hay: June 1, July 13, Sept 12,
##Potatoes: Half PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O, ploughed: Sept 14, 1966. Remeining PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O, and 'Nitro-Chalk' applied at 1.2 cwtN/acre: Mar 17, 1967. Potatoes planted Majestic: Mar 22, Earthed up: June 10.3 Sprayed with mancozeb at 1.2 lb in 30 gals: July 1, July 26, Avg 8, Sprayed with fentin acetate at 4,2 oz plus maned at 1.4 oz in 30 gals: Aug 21, Sprayed with undiluted BOV at 15 gals: Sept 6, Lifted: Sept 12
##Wheat: Half PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O, ploughed: Sept 14, 1966. Remaining PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O: Oct 21. Seed drilled Cappelle at 210 lb: Oct 26, N1 Nitro-Chalk applied as top-dressing at 0.5 cwtN/acre: Apr 14, 1967 N2 Nitro-Chalk applied as top-dressing at 1.0 cwtN/acre: Apr 14, 1967 N3 Nitro-Chalk applied as top-dressing at 1.5 cwtN/acre: Apr 14, 1967 N4 Nitro-Chalk applied as top-dressing at 2.0 cwtN/acre: Apr 14, 1967. Sprayed with Ioxynil/mecoprop (Actril C at 6 pints in 25 gals): Apr 27. Combine harvested: Aug 22
##Barley: Half PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O, ploughed: Sept 14, 1966. Remeining PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O, seed drilled Maris Badger at 140 lb: Mar 4, 1967. N1 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 0.4 cwtN/acre: Mar 17 N2 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 0.8 cwtN/acre: Mar 17 N3 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 1.2 cwtN/acre: Mar 17 N4 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 1.6 cwtN/acre: Mar 17. Sprayed with ioxynil/mecoprop (Actril C at 6 pints in 25 gals): Apr 27. Combine harvested: Aug 18

##Ley: Half PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O: 14 Sept, 1967. Ploughed: 15 - 16 Sept. Test Mg as Epsom Salts at 162 lb/acre and remaining PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O, seeds sown at 29 lb: 20 Sept, 'Nitro-Chalk' applied at 0.4 cwtN/acre applied: 27 Mar, 1968, Cut: 5 June, 6 Aug,
##Potatoes: Half PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O: 14 Sept, 1967. Ploughed: 15 - 16 Sept. Sprayed with paraquat at 0.5 lb in 33 gals on the permanent barley blocks: 2 Mar, Remaining PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O, 'Nitro-Chalk', Test Mg as Epsom Salts at 162 lb/acre applied: 26 Mar, Rotary cultivated, potatoes planted: 27 Mar. Earthed up: 22 May, Grubbed, rotary ridged: 13 June, Sprayed with mencozeb et 1.2 lb plus demeton-s-methyl at 3.5 oz in 38 gals on the permenent wheat blocks only: 12 July. Sprayed with mancozeb at 1.2 lb in 38 gals: 18 July, 30 July, Sprayed with undiluted BOV at 15 gals: 4 Sept. Lifted: 24 Sept.
##Wheat: Half PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O: 14 Sept, 1967. Ploughed: 15 - 16 Sept. Remaining PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O and Test Mg as Epsom Salts at 162 lb/acre applied, seed drilled at 170 lb: 13 Oct, 1967, N1 Nitro-Chalk applied as top-dressing at 0.5 cwtN/acre: 9 Apr N2 Nitro-Chalk applied as top-dressing at 1.0 cwtN/acre: 9 Apr N3 Nitro-Chalk applied as top-dressing at 1.5 cwtN/acre: 9 Apr N4 Nitro-Chalk applied as top-dressing at 2.0 cwtN/acre: 9 Apr, 1968, Sprayed with ioxynil/mecoprop (Actril C at 6 pints in 25 gals): 25 Apr. Combine harvested: 22 Aug,
##Barley: Half PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O: 14 Sept, 1967. Ploughed: 15 - 16 Sept. Sprayed with paraquat at 0.5 lb in 33 gels: 2 Mar, Remaining PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O: 4 Mar, Seed drilled at 140 lb: 6 Mar, N1 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 0.4 cwtN/acre: 15 Mar N2 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 0.8 cwtN/acre: 15 Mar N3 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 1.2 cwtN/acre: 15 Mar N4 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 1.6 cwtN/acre: 15 Mar, Sprayed with ioxynil/mecoprop (Actril C at 5 pints in 25 gals): 26 Apr, Combine harvested: 20 Aug.

##Ley: Half PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O: 1 Oct, 1968, Ploughed: 4 Oct. Remaining PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O and Test Mg as Epsom Salts at 162 lb/acre applied: 7 Oct. Seeds sown at 29 lb: 14 Oct. 'Nitro-Chalk' applied at 0.4 cwtN/acre: 27 Mar, 1969, Cut: 28 June, 3 Sept.
##Potatoes: Half PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O: 1 Oct, 1968, Ploughed: 4 Oct. Remaining PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O and Test Mg as Epsom Salts at 162 lb/acre applied: 7 Oct. 'Nitro-Chalk' applied at 1.2 cwtN/acre: 17 Apr. Rotary cultivated, potatoes planted: 18 Apr. Paraquat at 0.37 lb ion plus linuron at 0.5 lb in 25 gals: 15 May. Rotary ridged: 17 June, Mancozeb at 1.2 lb and Demeton-s-methyl at 3.5 oz in 37 gals: 18 July. Mancozeb at 1.2 lb in 37 gals: 7 Aug, 27 Aug. Haulm mechenically destroyed: 16 Sept, Lifted: 23 Sept.
##Wheat: Half PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O: 1 Oct, 1968, Ploughed: 4 Oct. Remaining PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O and Test Mg as Epsom Salts at 162 lb/acre applied: 7 Oct. Seed drilled at 175 lb: 17 Oct, 1968, N1 Nitro-Chalk applied as top-dressing at 0.5 cwtN/acre: 15 Apr, 1969 N2 Nitro-Chalk applied as top-dressing at 1.0 cwtN/acre: 15 Apr, 1969 N3 Nitro-Chalk applied as top-dressing at 1.5 cwtN/acre: 15 Apr, 1969 N4 Nitro-Chalk applied as top-dressing at 2.0 cwtN/acre: 15 Apr, 1969. Ioxynil at 9 oz plus mecoprop at 27 oz in 25 gals: 2 May, Combine harvested: 29 Aug.
##Barley: Half PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O: 1 Oct, 1968, Ploughed: 4 Oct. Remaining PK applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O and Test Mg as Epsom Salts at 162 lb/acre applied: 7 Oct. Seed drilled at 140 lb: 11 Mar resown 16 Apr, N1 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 0.4 cwtN/acre: 3 Apr N2 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 0.8 cwtN/acre: 3 Apr N3 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 1.2 cwtN/acre: 3 Apr N4 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 1.6 cwtN/acre: 3 Apr. Ioxynil octancate, bromoxynil octencate and iso-octyl ester of dichlorprop ('Oxytril P' at 1 pt in 25 gals): 22 May. Combine harvested: 29 Aug.

##All plots: All test Mg as Epsom Salts to Barley blocks at 990 lb/acre: 25 Sept, 1969 Half test Mg as Epsom Salts to Wheat blocks at 990 lb/acre: 25 Sept, 1969 half PK(0:14:28) applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O: 25 Sept, 1969. Ploughed: 26 Sept. Remaining PK(0:14:28) applied 0.5 cwt P2O5, 1.0 cwt K2O: 29 Sept,
##Ley: Paraquat at 0.5 lb ion in 37 gals: 10 Sept, 1969, Ryegrass Seed sown at 28 lb: 30 Sept, N applied as Nitro-Chalk at 1.0 cwtN/acre: 16 Mar, 1970.3 16 June, 24 July. Cut: 11 June, Topped (no yields taken) 23 July, 3 Sept, N applied as Nitro-Chalk at 0.75 cwtN/acre 11 June, 23 July
##Potatoes: Remaining Mg applied on wheat block at 990 lb/acre: 30 Sept, 1969, N applied as Nitro-Chalk at 1.2 cwtN/acre: 17 Apr, 1970. Rotary cultivated, potatoes planted: 22 Apr. Linuron at 1.0 lb Plus paraquat at 0.37 lb ion in 33 gals: 13 May, Grubbed, rotary ridged: 6 June, Mancozeb at 1.2 lb and Demeton-s-methyl at 3.5 fl oz in 37 gals: 31 July. Mancozeb at 1.2 lb in 37 gals: 18 Aug, Sprayed with undiluted BOV at 20 gals: 7 Sept. Lifted: 15 Sept,
##Wheat: Paraquat at 0.5 lb ion in 37 gals: 10 Sept, 1960.3 Remaining Mg applied on wheat block at 990 lb/acre: 30 Sept. Rotary cultivated, seed drilled at 170 lb: 23 Oct. N1 Nitro-Chalk applied as top-dressing at 0.5 cwtN/acre: 24 Apr, 1970 N2 Nitro-Chalk applied as top-dressing at 1.0 cwtN/acre: 24 Apr, 1970 N3 Nitro-Chalk applied as top-dressing at 1.5 cwtN/acre: 24 Apr, 1970 N4 Nitro-Chalk applied as top-dressing at 2.0 cwtN/acre: 24 Apr, 1970.3 Ioxynil at 9 oz plus mecoprop at 27 oz in 25 gals: 7 May. Combine harvested: 14 Aug,
##Barley: Paraquat at 0.5 lb ion in 37 gals: 10 Sept, 1969. Power Harrowed, seed drilled Julia at 135 lb: 25 Mar, 1970. N1 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 0.4 cwtN/acre: 31 Mar N2 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 0.8 cwtN/acre: 31 Mar N3 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 1.2 cwtN/acre: 31 Mar N4 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 1.6 cwtN/acre: 31 Mar, Ioxynil at 6.5 oz plus mecoprop et 22.5 oz in 25 gals: 18 May, Combine harvested: 11 Aug

##All plots: Paraquat applied: 16 Sept, 1970. Half PK (0:14:28) applied - 63 kgP2O5, 126 kgK2O: 24 Sept magnesian limestone applied at 3765 kg/ha ploughed in: 6 Oct. Ploughed: 10 Oct. Remaining PK (0:14:28) applied - 63 kgP2O5, 126 kgK2O Remaining magnesian limestone at 1255 kg/ha applied to plough furrow applied: 14 Oct.
##Leys: Deep-tine cultivated barley blocks: 21 Oct, 1970.3 N applied at 63 kgN/ha: 1 Apr. Seeds sown Italian Ryegrass S22 at 33 kg: 2 Apr. N applied at 63 kgN/ha: 2 June First cut: 16 July. N applied at 75 kgN/ha: 19 July, Second cut: 8 Sept
##Potatoes: Deep-tine cultivated barley blocks: 21 Oct, 1970. N as 'Nitro-chalk 21' applied at 150 kgN/ha: 29 Mar, 1971. Rotary cultivated, potatoes planted Majestic: 30 Mar, Linuron at 1.12 kg in 371 l: 5 May. Rotary ridged: 1 June, Mancozeb at 1.34 kg and Demeton-s-methyl at 246 ml in 416 l: 28 June, Mancozeb at 1.34 kg in 371 l: 12 Aug, Haulm mechanically destroyed: 13 Sept. Lifted: 14 Sept
##Wheat: Seed drilled Capelle at 191 kg: 14 Oct, 1970. N1 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 63 kgN/ha: 14 Apr, 1971, N2 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 126 kgN/ha: 14 Apr, 1971, N3 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 189 kgN/ha: 14 Apr, 1971, N4 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 252 kgN/ha: 14 Apr, 1971, Ioxynil at 0.53 Kg and mecoprop at 1.58 kg in 281 l: 28 Apr. Combine harvested: 28 Aug.
##Barley: Deep-tine cultivated: 21 Oct, 1970. N1 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 63 kgN/ha: 17 Mar, 1971, N2 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 126 kgN/ha: 17 Mar, 1971, N3 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 189 kgN/ha: 17 Mar, 1971, N4 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 252 kgN/ha: 17 Mar, 1971 seed drilled Julia at 157 kg: 17 Mar, 1971. Power harrowed, re-drilled at 157 kg: 9 Apr, Ioxynil at 0.53 Kg and mecoprop at 1.58 kg in 281 l: 18 May, Combine harvested: 25 Aug.

##All plots: Half PK (0:14:28) applied - 65 kgP2O5, 130 kgK2O, ploughed: 1 Oct, 1971. Remaining (0:14:28) applied - 65 kgP2O5, 130 kgK2O applied: 7 Oct.
##Leys: Paraquat at 0.56 ion kg in 280 l: 9 Sept, 1971. Deep-tine cultivated, wheat block only: 4 Nov, N applied at 63 kgN/ha to seedbed as Nitro-Chalk: 18 Apr, 1972. Rotary cultivated: 21 Apr. Seed sown Italian Ryegrass S22 at 28kg: 26 Apr, N applied at 63 kgN/ha as Nitro-Chalk: 6 June, Cut once: 6 Sept,
##Potatoes: Deep-tine cultiveted, wheat block only: 4 Nov, 1971. N applied at 150 kgN/ha as Nitro-Chalk: 4 Apr; 1972, Rotery cultivated, potatoes planted Majestic: 18 Apr, Linuron at 1.1 kg with paraquat at 0.4 kg ion in 370 l: 6 May, Rotary ridged: 19 June, Mancozeb at 1.3 kg in 430 l: 5 July, Mancozeb at 1.3 kg with demeton-s-metiyl at 0.25 kg in 430 l: 27 July, Haulm mechanically destroyed: 14 Sept, Lifted: 20 Sept.
##Wheat: Paraquat at 0.56 ion kg in 280 l: 9 Sept, 1971. Seed drilled Cappelle, at 180 kg: 15 Oct, N1 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 63 kgN/ha: 11 Apr, 1972, N2 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 126 kgN/ha: 11 Apr, 1972, N3 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 189 kgN/ha: 11 Apr, 1972, N4 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 252 kgN/ha: 11 Apr, 1972. 2,4-D at 0.7 kg with dichlorprop at 2.8 kg in 280 l: 27 Apr. Combine harvested: 30 Aug.
##Barley: Paraquat at 0.56 ion kg in 280 l: 9 Sept, 1971. Seed drilled Julie (dressed with ethirimol) sown at 180 kg: 15 Mar, 1972. N1 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 50 kgN/ha: 16 Mar, N2 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 100 kgN/ha: 16 Mar, N3 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 150 kgN/ha: 16 Mar, N4 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 200 kgN/ha: 16 Mar, 2,4-D at 0.56 kg with dichlorprop at 2.2 kg in 280 l: 8 May, Combine harvested: 24 Aug,

##All plots: Half PK (0:14:28) applied - 65 kgP2O5, 130 kgK2O: 4 Oct, 1972. Ploughed: 10 Oct, Remaining PK (0:14:28) applied - 65 kgP2O5, 130 kgK2O: 17 Oct.
##ley: Paraquat at 0.56 kg ion in 280 l: 6 Sept, 1972. Power harrowed, wheat site only: 18 Oct, 'Nitro-Chalk' at 60 kg N in seedbed: 16 Mar, 1973. Seeds sown Italian ryegrass S22, sown at 40 kg: 20 Mar, N applied at 60 kgN as Nitro-Chalk: 18 May, 3 July, Cut twice: 2 July, 28 Aug.
##Potatoes: Power harrowed, wheat site only: 18 Oct, 1972. N applied at 150 kgN/ha: 23 Mar, 1973. Rotary cultivated: 6 Apr. Potatoes planted Majestic: 7 Apr. Linuron at 1.2 kg plus paraquat at 0.42 kg ion in 280 l: 14 May, Grubbed: 1 June, Rotary ridged: 16 June, Mancozeb at 1.3 kg plus demeton-s-methyl at 0.25 kg in 390 l: 5 July. Mancozeb at 1.3 kg in 390 l: 26 July, Mancozeb at 1.3 kg in 370 l: 13 Aug. Haulm mechanically destroyed: 19 Sept, Sprayed with undiluted BOV at 220 l: 24 Sept, Lifted: 4 Oct,
##Wheat: Paraquat at 0.56 kg ion in 280 l: 6 Sept, 1972. Power harrowed: 18 Oct. Seed sown Capelle at 200 kg: 20 Oct. N1 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 63 kgN/ha: 12 Apr, 1973, N2 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 126 kgN/ha: 12 Apr, 1973, N3 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 189 kgN/ha: 12 Apr, 1973, N4 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 252 kgN/ha: 12 Apr, 1973. Ioxynil at 0.63 kg with mecoprop at 1.9 kg in 200 l: 26 Apr. Combine harvested: 22 Aug,
##Barley: Paraquat at 0.56 kg ion in 280 l: 6 Sept, 1972. Seed sown Julie, dressed with ethirimol, sown at 160 kg: 12 Mar, 1973. N1 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 50 kgN/ha: 16 Mar, N2 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 100 kgN/ha: 16 Mar, N3 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 150 kgN/ha: 16 Mar, N4 Nitro-Chalk applied in the seedbed at 200 kgN/ha: 16 Mar, Ioxynil at 0.53 kg with mecoprop at 1.6 kg in 280 l: 11 May. Combine harvested: 13 Aug.

##All plots: Paraquat at 0.56 kg ion in 370 l: 12 Sept, 1973. Magnesian limestone applied at 3.5 tonnes: 5 Oct. Half PK applied P205 at 65 kg, K20 at 130 kg as (0:14:28): 10 Oct. Ploughed: 11 Oct, Remaining PK applied P205 at 65 kg, K20 at 130 kg as (0:14:28) to the plough furrow: 12 Oct. Spring-tine cultivateds 13 Oct.
##Leys: Spring-tine cultivated: 30 Mar, 1974. Power harrowed, N applied at 60 kg, as Nitro-Chalk, seeds sown Italian ryegrass sown at 40 kg: 5 Apr. N applied at 60 kg, as Nitro-Chalk: 31 May, 2 July, 19 Aug. Cut: 1 July, 15 Aug, 24 Sept
##Potatoes: Spring-tine cultivated: 30 Mar, 1974. N applied at 150 kg as Nitro-Chalk, rotary cultivated: 9 Apr. Potatoes planted Pentland Crown: 10 Apr. Linuron at 1.2 kg plus paraquat at 0.28 kg ion in 280 l: 15 May. Rotary ridged: 11 June, Mancozeb at 1.3 kg plus demeton-s-methyl at 0.25 kg in 450 l: 18 July. Mancozeb at 1.3 kg in 450 l: 7 Aug. Haulm mechanically destroyed: 12 Sept. Sprayed with undiluted BOV at 170 l: 18 Sept. Lifted: 30 sept.
##Wheat: Seed sown Cappelle, sown at 190 kg: 15 Oct, 1973. Ioxynil at 0.63 kg with mecoprop at 1.9 kg in 280 l: 5 Apr, 197h. N1 Nitro-Chalk applied at 63 kgN/ha: 9 Apr 1974, N2 Nitro-Chalk applied at 126 kgN/ha: 9 Apr, N3 Nitro-Chalk applied at 189 kgN/ha: 9 Apr, N4 Nitro-Chalk applied at 252 kgN/ha: 9 Apr. ioxynil at 0.52 kg with mecoprop at 1.6 kg in 280 l: 14 May. Combine harvested: 30 Aug.
##Barley: Spring-tine cultivated: 27 Mar, 1974. Spring-tine cultivated with crumbler: 28 Mar. Seed sown Julia, dressed with ethirimol, sown at 160 kg: 29 Mar, N1 Nitro-Chalk applied at 50 kgN/ha: 1 Apr, N2 Nitro-Chalk applied at 100 kgN/ha: 1 Apr, N3 Nitro-Chalk applied at 150 kgN/ha: 1 Apr, N4 Nitro-Chalk applied at 200 kgN/ha: 1 Apr. Ioxynil at 0.52 kg and mecoprop at 1.6 kg in 280 l: 14 May, Combine harvested: 22 Aug.

##All plots: Half PK applied P205 at 65 kg, K20 at 130 kg as (0:14:28), ploughed: 30 Oct, 1974. Remaining PK applied P205 at 65 kg, K20 at 130 kg as (0:14:28): 8 Nov, Spring-tine cultiveted: 27 Nov.
##Leys: Aminotriazole applied at 4.5 kg in 260 l: 11 Sep, 1974. Spring-tine cultivated four times with crumbler on the second and forth occasions: 26 Feb, 3 Mar, 24 Apr, 28 Apr, 1975. N applied at 60 kgN, as 'Nitro-Chalk': 18 Apr, 11 June, Seed sown Italian Ryegrass at 40 kg: 2 May. Topped: 8 July, 21 Aug,
##Potatoes: Spring-tine cultivated three times on the second occasion with crupbler: 26 Feb, 3 Mar, 24 Apr, 1975. N applied at 150 kgN, as 'Nitro-Chalk': 18 Apr. Deep-tine cultivated: 25 Apr. Rotary cultivated, potetoes planted Pentland Crown: 5 May. Liruron at 1.2 kg plus paraquat at 0.28 kg ion in 280 l: 22 May, Grubbed: 23 June. Rotary ridged: 24 June, Demeton-s-methyl at 0.25 kg in 286 l: 25 June, Mancozeb at 1.3 kg in 390 l: 15 July. Haulm mechanicelly destroyed: 26 Sept. Sprayed with undiluted B.0.V. at 160 l: 2 Oct. Litted: 6 Oct.
##Wheat: Seed sown Cappelle at 200 kg: 27 nov, 1974. N1 Nitro-Chalk applied at 63 kgN/ha: 24 Mar, 1975. N2 Nitro-Chalk applied at 126 kgN/ha: 24 Mar, 1975. N4 Nitro-Chalk applied at 252 kgN/ha: 24 Mar, 1975. N3 Nitro-Chalk applied at 189 kgN/ha: 24 Mar, 1975. Aminotriazole at 4.5 kg in 280 1, Ioxynil at 0.63 kg with meccprop at 1.9 kg in 280 l: 8 May. Combine barvested: 12 mug.
##Barley: Spring-tine dtivated twice, second time with crumbler: 26 Feb, 3 Mar, 1675. Seed sown Julia dressed Ethirimol sown at 160 kg: 4 Mar. N1 Nitro-Chalk applied at 50 kgN/ha: 10 Mar N2 Nitro-Chalk applied at 100 kgN/ha: 10 Mar N3 Nitro-Chalk applied at 150 kgN/ha: 10 Mar N4 Nitro-Chalk applied at 200 kgN/ha: 10 Mar. Spring-tine cultivated with crunbler three times, seed resown: 1 May, Aminotriazole at 4.5 kg in 280 1. Ioxynil at 0.52 kg with mecoprop at 1.6 kg in 280 l: 4 June. Combine harvested: 18 Aug.

##All plots: Half PK applied P205 at 65 kg, K20 at 130 kg as (0:14:28), ploughed: 24 Oct, 1975. Remaining PK applied P205 at 65 kg, K20 at 130 kg as (0:14:28): 27 Oct.
##Leys: Glyphosate at 1.7 kg in 340 l applied to wheat stubble only: 5 Oct, 1975. Spring-tine cultivated wheat blocks only: 27 Oct. Deep-tine cultivated barley blocks only: 29 Dec. Spring-tine cultivated barley blocks: 2 Mar, 1976, Spring-tine cultivated wheat blocks: 9 Mar. N applied at 60 kg as Nitro-Chalk: 20 Apr. Seed sown Italian ryegrass, sown at 40 kg: 27 Apr. N applied at 60 kg as Nitro-Chalk: 9 June. Cut once: 20 Oct.
##Potatoes: Rotary cultivated: 14 Oct, 1975. Spring-tine cultivated barley blocks: 2 Mar, 1976, wheat blocks: 9 Mar. N applied at 150 kgN as Nitro-Chalk: 30 Mar. Rotary cultivated, potatoes planted Pentland Crown: 6 Apr. Linuron at 1.2 kg plus paraquat at 0.42 kg ion in 280 l: 7 May. Rotary ridged: 3 June. Pirimicarb at 0.14 kg in 450 l: 18 June. Mancozeb at 1.3 kg with demeton-s-methyl at 0.25 kg in 450 l: 30 June. Mancozeb at 1.3 kg in 450 l: 30 July. Haulm mechanically destroyed: 15 Sept. Haulm desiccant applied Diquat at 0.59 kg ion in 280 l: 6 Oct. Lifted: 19 Oct.
##Wheat: Glyphosate at 1.7 kg in 340 l: 5 Oct, 1975. Spring-tine cultivated, seed sown Cappelle sown at 210 kg: 27 Oct. N1 Nitro-Chalk applied at 63 kgN/ha: 1 Apr, 1976. N2 Nitro-Chalk applied at 126 kgN/ha: 1 Apr, 1976. N4 Nitro-Chalk applied at 252 kgN/ha: 1 Apr, 1976. N3 Nitro-Chalk applied at 189 kgN/ha: 1 Apr, 1976. Ioxynil at 0.63 kg plus mecoprop at 1.9 kg in 280 l: 20 Apr. Combine harvested: 2 Aug.
##Barley: Deep-tine cultivated: 29 Dec, 1975. Spring-tine cultivated: 2 Mar, 1976. Seed sown Julia, dressed with ethirimol, sown at 160 kg: 8 Mar. N1 Nitro-Chalk applied at 50 kgN/ha: 9 Mar N2 Nitro-Chalk applied at 100 kgN/ha: 9 Mar N3 Nitro-Chalk applied at 150 kgN/ha: 9 Mar N4 Nitro-Chalk applied at 200 kgN/ha: 9 Mar. loxynil at 0.52 kg and mecoprop at 1.6 kg in 280 l: 28 Apr. Combine harvested: 26 July.

##All plots: Glyphosate at 1.7 kg in 280 l: 24 Sept, 1976. Rotary cultivated grass leys: 1 Nov. Ploughed: 8 Nov.
##Wheat: test Aldicarb applied at 10 kg/ha, rotary cultivated, seed sown Cappelle, sown at 210 kg PK (0:20:20) at 290 kg, combine drilled: 24 Nov, 1976. methabenzthiazuron at 1.6 kg in 280 l: 25 Nov. N1 Nitro-Chalk applied at 63 kgN/ha: 12 Apr, 1977 N2 Nitro-Chalk applied at 126 kgN/ha: 12 Apr, 1977 N4 Nitro-Chalk applied at 252 kgN/ha: 12 Apr, 1977 N3 Nitro-Chalk applied at 189 kgN/ha: 12 Apr, 1977. Ioxynil at 0.53 kg plus mecoprop at 1.6 kg in 220 l: 15 May. Pirimicarb at 0.14 kg in 270 l: 11 July. Combine harvested: 7 Sept.

##All plots: Ploughed: 24 Sept, 1979. test Dazomet applied 336 kg/ha and all plots rotary cultivated: 25 Sept.
##W. wheat: Glyphosate at 1.7 kg in 250 l: 13 Sept, 1979. Spring-tine cultivated with crumbler attached: 24 Oct. Seed sown, Flanders, sown at 190 kg, (0:20:20) at 310 kg, combine drilled: 13 Nov. N4 Nitro-Chalk applied at 63 kgN/ha: 19 Nov. Isoproturon at 2.1 l in 280 l: 12 Apr, 1980. Demeton-s-methyl at 0.21 kg in 300 l: 5 July. Combine harvested: 26 Aug.
##S. barley: Heavy spring-tine cultivated: 3 Mar, 1980.3 24 Mar, 9 Apr. Rotary cultivated, seed sown Georgie, dressed with ethirimol, sown at 160 kg, (0:20:20) at 300 kg, combine drilled: 10 Apr. N1 Nitro-Chalk applied at 50 kgN/ha: 15 Apr N2 Nitro-Chalk applied at 100 kgN/ha: 15 Apr N3 Nitro-Chalk applied at 150 kgN/ha: 15 Apr N4 Nitro-Chalk applied at 200 kgN/ha: 15 Apr. 'Brittox' at 3.5l in 280 1 and Tridemorph at 0.53 kg in 280 l: 16 May. Ethirimol ('Milgo E' at 1.3 l in 280 l): 5 June. Combine harvested: 22 Aug.

##W. wheat: Glyphosate at 1.5 l in 280 l: 9 Sept, 1980. Chalk at 7.5 t applied: 11 Sept. Ploughed: 16 Sept. Spring-tine cultivated: 25 Sept. Spring-tine cultivated with crumbler attached, rotary cultivated after barley only: 30 Sept. Seed sown Flanders, sown at 190 kg, NPK (10:23:23) at 280 kg: 1 Oct. Chlortoluron at 4.5 l in 300 l: 3 Oct. N applied at 150 kg as 'Nitro-Chalk': 10 Apr, 1981. Mecoprop with bromoxynil and ioxynil (as 'Brittox' at 2.4 l) in 280 l: 22 Apr. Triadimefon with captafol (as ‘'Bayleton CF' at 2.0 kg) in 280 l: 20 June. Combine harvested: 19 Aug.
##1st year ley: Glyphosate at 1.5 l in 280 l: 9 Sept, 1980. Chalk at 7.5 t applied: 11 Sept. Ploughed: 16 Sept. Spring-tine cultivated, NPK applied (10:23:23) at 300 kg: 25 Sept. Seeds sown S23 perennial ryegrass at 31 kg, Blanca white clover at 8 kg, mixture sown at 39 kg.: 26 Sept. N applied at 65 kg as 'Nitro-Chalk': 7 May, 1981. Cut: 11 June, 8 Sept.

##W. wheat: Glyphosate at 1.5 kg in 280 l: 16 Sept, 1981. Ploughed: 25 Sept. NPK applied (10:23:23) at 280 kg: 29 Sept. Spring-tine cultivated with crumbler attached: 7 Oct. ##1st year ley: Glyphosate at 1.5 kg in 280 l: 16 Sept, 1981. Ploughed: 25 Sept. NPK applied (10:23:23) at 280 kg: 29 Sept. Spring-tine cultivated with crumbler attached: 7 Oct, 15 Apr, 1982, 19 Apr. Seeds sown S23 perennial ryegrass at 31 kg, Blanca white clover at 8 kg, mixture sown at 39 kg: 29 Apr. Topped: 16 June, N applied at 40 kg as 'Nitro-Chalk': 23 June. Cut: 13 July.
##2nd year ley: PK applied (0:14:28) at 490 kg: 8 Feb, 1982. Cut: 13 July.

##w wheat: ploughed: 13 Sept 1983 NPK applied (5:14:30) at 340 kg: 28 Sept rotary cultivated, seed sown Avalon, sown at 200 kg: 28 Sept Chlortoluron at 3.5 kg in 250 l: 29 Sept N applied at 140 kg as 'Nitro-Chalk': 4 Apr 1984 combine harvested 21 Aug
##ley 1st year ploughed: 13 Sept 1983 NPK applied (5:14:30) at 340 kg, rotary cultivated: 28 Sept seeds sown S23 perennial ryegrass at 27 kg, Blanca white clover at 7 kg, mixture sown at 34 kg: 29 Sept N applied at 50 kg as ‘Nitro-Chalk': 27 Mar 1984 cut: 17 June, 11 Sept
##Ley, 2nd, 3rd and 4th years: PK applied (0:18:36) at 380 kg: 31 Jan 1984 cut: 17 June, 11 Sept

##Ley, 1st year: ploughed: 4 dec 1985 heavy spring-tine cultivated, spike harrowed with crumbler attached, seeds sown S23 perennial ryegrass at 27 kg, Blanca white clover at 7 kg, mixture sown at 34 kg. 7 May 1986 N applied at 50 kg as 'Nitro-Chalk', rolled: 8 may NPK applied (5:14:30) at 340 kg: 5 June topped: 12 June.
##Ley, 2nd, 3rd, 4th, 5th and 6th years: PK applied (0:18:36) at 400 kg: 29 Nov 1985 cut: 12 June

##winter wheat Ploughed and rolled: 17 July, 1986. Subsoiled with 25 cm wings on tines 30 cm deep and 70 cm apart, in two directions at right angles: 28 Aug. Glyphosate at 1.4 kg in 200 l: 16 Sept. Methiocarb at 0.22 kg: 18 Sept. PK applied (0:18:36) at 560 kg: 25 Sept. Carbofuran at 7.5 kg: 25 Sept. rotary harrowed with crumbler attached, : 25 Sept. seed sown Mercia, sown at 190 kg: 25 Sept. Chlortoluron at 5.6 kg in 200 l: 9 Oct. Mn at 0.16 kg as manganese sulphate in 240 l: 14 Apr 1987 Prochloraz at 0.34 kg with carbendazim at 0.13 kg and Chlormequat at 1.1 kg in 240 l: 14 Apr, 1987. Clopyralid at 0.07 kg, bromoxynil at 0.334 kg with mecoprop at 2.5 kg in 240 l: 14 Apr. N1 at 50 kgN/ha as Nitro-Chalk: 23 Apr N2 at 100 kgN/ha as Nitro-Chalk: 23 Apr N3 at 150 kgN/ha as Nitro-Chalk: 23 Apr N4 at 200 kgN/ha as Nitro-Chalk: 23 Apr N5 at 250 kgN/ha as Nitro-Chalk: 23 Apr. Fenpropimorph at 0.75 kg with chlorothalonil at 0.75 kg in 200 l: 5 June. Propiconazole at 0.12 kg with carbendazim and maneb (as 'Septal' at 2.5 kg) in 200 l: 29 June, Combine harvested: 1 Sept.

##potatoes Glyphosate at 1.4 kg in 200 l: 22 Sept, 1987. Ploughed: 22 Feb, 1988. Heavy spring-tine cultivated: 5 Apr. PK applied (0:18:36) at 1400 kg: 8 Apr. N1 at 70 kgN/ha as Nitro-Chalk: 20 Apr N2 at 140 kgN/ha as Nitro-Chalk: 20 Apr N3 at 210 kgN/ha as Nitro-Chalk: 20 Apr N4 at 280 kgN/ha as Nitro-Chalk: 20 Apr N5 at 350 kgN/ha as Nitro-Chalk: 20 Apr Oxamyl at 5.0 kg, spring-tine cultivated: 20 Apr. Mg at 100 kg as kieserite, rotary harrowed, potatoes planted Pentland Crown: 21 Apr Rotary ridged, Linuron at 1.5 kg in 220 l: 13 May. Mancozeb at 1.4 kg in 220 l: 15 July and 1 Aug. Mancozeb at 1.4 kg in 220 1 with pirimicarb Pirimicarb at 0.14 kg: 14 June, 5 July and 15 Aug. Fentin hydroxide at 0.28 kg in 220 l: 30 Aug. Desiccant Diquat at 0.80 kg ion in 400 l: 15 Sept. Haulm mechanically destroyed: 29 Sept. Potatoes lifted: 26 Oct.

##wheat Ploughed: 28 Oct, 1988. Dolomite at 5 t, Methiocarb at 0.20 kg: 29 Oct. PK applied (0:18:36) at 556 kg: 31 Oct. Carbofuran at 7.5 kg and cultivated in: 1 Nov. Spike harrowed with crumbler attached, seed sown Mercia, with methiocarb pellets, sown at 165 kg: 2 Nov, Seed sown Mercia without methiocarb, Mercia, sown at 180 kg : 13 Dec. Omitted plots spring-tine cultivated: 6 Feb, 1989. Omitted plots re-sown: 7 Feb. Omitted plots harrowed and sown to s. wheat Alexandria, sown at 180 kg: 31 Mar. Mecoprop at 2.5 kg with bromoxynil at 0.34 kg and clopyralid at 0.07 kg in 220 l: 28 Apr. Manganese at 0.096 kg Mn as a foliar spray in 220 l: 29 Apr and 22 May. N1 at 50 kgN/ha as Nitro-Chalk: 3 May N2 at 100 kgN/ha as Nitro-Chalk: 3 May N3 at 150 kgN/ha as Nitro-Chalk: 3 May N4 at 200 kgN/ha as Nitro-Chalk: 3 May N5 at 250 kgN/ha as Nitro-Chalk: 3 May. Prochloraz at 0.40 kg with carbendazim at 0.15 kg applied with Chlormequat chloride at 1.6 kg in 220 l: 17 May. pPropiconazole at 0.12 kg in 220 l: 5 June. Metsulfuron-methyl at 6.0 g in 220 1 to s. wheat only: 13 June. Fenpropimorph at 0.75 kg with maneb at 1.6 kg and carbendazim at 0.25 kg in 220 l: 3 July. Combine barvested: 7 Aug.

##winter beans Subsoiled with tines 50 cm apart and 40 cm deep: 15 Sept, 1989. PK applied (0:24:24) at 420 kg and K applied as Muriate of potash at 170 kg: 19 Sept. Paraquat at 0.80 kg ion in 220 l: 10 Oct. Disced: 11 Oct. Seed Banner sown at 18 seeds per square metre broadcast by drill, ploughed in and rolled: 12 Oct. Propyzamide at 0.85 kg with simazine at 0.85 kg in 220 l: 15 Oct. Manganese at 0.19 kg in 220 l: 5 Apr, 1990. Deltamethrin at 7.5 g in 220 l: 23 Apr and 18 May. Fenpropimorph at 0.75 kg in 220 l: 11 July. Combine harvested: 11 Aug.
